price: Ummata Nuuhis san dura (ballessinee jirra). isaan ummata finciltoota turan.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
